table.name: vtiger_wsapp
table.sql: ALTER TABLE vtiger_wsapp MODIFY COLUMN name varchar(200) NOT NULL

table.name: vtiger_wsapp_handlerdetails
table.sql: ALTER TABLE vtiger_wsapp_handlerdetails MODIFY COLUMN type varchar(200) NOT NULL

table.name: vtiger_wsapp
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_wsapp` ( `appid` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `appkey` varchar(255) default NULL, `type` varchar(100) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`appid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_wsapp_recordmapping
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_wsapp_recordmapping` ( `id` int(19) NOT NULL auto_increment, `serverid` varchar(10) default NULL, `clientid` varchar(255) default NULL, `clientmodifiedtime` datetime default NULL, `appid` int(11) default NULL, `servermodifiedtime` datetime default NULL, `serverappid` int(11) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_wsapp_handlerdetails
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_wsapp_handlerdetails` ( `type` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `handlerclass` varchar(100) default NULL, `handlerpath` varchar(300) default NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_wsapp_queuerecords
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_wsapp_queuerecords` ( `syncserverid` int(19) default NULL, `details` varchar(300) default NULL, `flag` varchar(100) default NULL, `appid` int(19) default NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_wsapp_sync_state
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_wsapp_sync_state` ( `id` int(19) NOT NULL auto_increment, `name` varchar(200) default NULL, `stateencodedvalues` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `userid` int(19) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
